title: Drakker - Run With The Wolf   2015 ak
description:
It's time for Italian epic power metal act Drakkar to sail again. As previously disclosed by the band, the new album will be entitled "Run With the Wolf." My Kingdom Music has announced that the fifth studio album is set to drop on March 16th.


The album is once again an epic journey, a perfect mixture of power and traditional metal that will have you sing along from start to finish! Special guest appearances by Terence Holler (Eldritch), Olaf Thorsen (Vision Divine/Labyrinth) and Mat Stancioiu (ex-Labyrinth) make it a must for all fans of the Italian metal scene.


The album will be released in limited digipack deluxe edition including a bonus CD titled "Coming From The Past," with 5 classic songs from the first three albums of Drakkar re-recorded, refreshed and taken to new heights by the current lineup!


The dragonship sails on! More details are expected soon.



Band Members:
Dario Beretta - Guitar (Crimson Dawn)
Dave Dell'Orto - Vocals
Simone Cappato - Bass (Controsigillo)
Paolo Pirola - Drums
Emanuele Laghi - Keyboards
Corrado Solarino - Keyboards


Guests:
Terence Holler (Eldritch)
Olaf Thorsen (Vision Divine, Labyrinth)
Mat Stancioiu - (ex-Labyrinth)
